title: PonyRacer Ninja Squad
detail: Explore Angular development with Ninja Squad's PonyRacer project. This comprehensive learning resource takes you step-by-step through building a feature-rich application, covering components, services, routing, dependency injection, modules, HTTP, WebSockets, lazy loading, authentication, and much more.

title: Portfolio
detail: A sleek and responsive portfolio built with Next.js (this one !), showcasing my projects, skills, and experiences. </br> Feel free to explore, contribute, or reach out with any inquiries !

title: TuneTogether
detail: Wanna rock the music world like a superstar without breaking the bank? Tune Together is your backstage pass to create, connect, and celebrate music in a whole new way! </br> Crowfunding DApp built with Next.js and Solidity. Developed as part of the Alyra blockchain training program.
